item.title: Kentucky lawsuit says Roblox fails to protect children on its online gaming platform
item.description: Kentucky Attorney General Russell Coleman says the online gaming platform Roblox has become a “playground for predators.”

item.title: Bob Ross paintings to be auctioned to support public TV stations after federal funding cuts
item.description: Thirty paintings by Bob Ross are set to be auctioned to support public television stations

item.title: Asian shares are mostly lower after US stocks retreat
item.description: Shares are mostly lower in Asia after Wall Street snapped a long streak of records

item.title: Desperate search for fuel in Mali's capital as al-Qaida-linked group enforces blockade
item.description: Residents in Mali's capital, Bamako, are struggling with a fuel shortage due to a blockade by a militant group linked to al-Qaida

item.title: Senate confirmation of Trump nominee cements his shake-up of top civil rights agency
item.description: The Senate has confirmed President Donald Trump’s pick to fill a critical vacancy at the top agency for worker rights, restoring it to the full power ...
